subject: Boxing
Prisons and Prisoners
Murders and Attempted Murders
Race and Ethnicity
False Arrests, Convictions and Imprisonments
lead_paragraph: Rubin Carter led a fascinating life, one that can be used as a lesson to young athletes so consumed with attaining wealth and glory that they lose sight of forging an enduring legacy.
snippet: Rubin Carter led a fascinating life, one that can be used as a lesson to young athletes so consumed with attaining wealth and glory that they lose sight of forging an enduring legacy.
